name: Verify Manager can create new folder
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Manager` role.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can create new folder.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization via API.
  • Invite second user to project with Manager role.

Verify that:

  • Manager can create new folder.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Manager` role.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can create new folder.
